attributes.action: Scrap the toll at the Dartford Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I gather the argument to keep the toll is that it discourages drivers and riders from using the crossing and hence reduces congestion. 

Surely though to remove the toll and thus the toll booths will instantly reduce congestion by not forcing drivers and riders to stop!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
